topic: How to containerize WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to containerize WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Containerizing WebAssembly (WASM) Targets Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize WebAssembly (WASM) targets using FastAPI in Python 3.12+, empowering you to develop and deploy high-performance web applications with ease.
key_points: Understand the benefits of containerization for WASM applications
Set up a development environment with Python 3.12+
Install necessary packages, including FastAPI, Uvicorn, and Emscripten SDK
Create a FastAPI application to serve WASM modules
Run and test the containerized WASM application

code_examples.code: cat Dockerfile | docker build -t wasm-fastapi . && docker run -p 80:80 wasm-fastam

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial
Ensure you have the latest versions of FastAPI, Uvicorn, and Emscripten SDK installed
caveats: This guide assumes a basic understanding of Python, FastAPI, Docker, and containerization concepts.
Always ensure to test your applications thoroughly before deploying in production.
